数据{{deleteText}}后不可恢复，请谨慎操作: Data will be irreversible after {{deleteText}}, proceed with caution.
该操作不可逆，数据删除后不能恢复，请谨慎操作，是否确认删除？: Operation is irreversible, data cannot be recovered after deletion. Proceed with caution. Confirm delete?
日历名称字数不能超过64个字符: Calendar Name Must Be Less Than 64 Characters
名称字数不能超过64个字符: Name Must Be Less Than 64 Characters
备注字数不能超过2000个字符: Remarks Must Be Less Than 2000 Characters
颜色必须是#后面跟6位16进制的数字: Color Must Be A Hexadecimal Number Starting With #
不保存到快速选择名称中: Do Not Save to Quick Select Names
数值字段最终会表现在数据统计中。: The Value Field Will Be Reflected in Data Statistics.
您可以用它来表示任何值，如“体重、工时、存款、消费”等，数据统计中会展示趋势和累: You Can Use It to Represent Any Value Such as 'Weight, Working Hours, Savings, Consumption', etc. Trends and Cumulative Totals Will Be Displayed in Data Statistics.
开始日期、开始时间、结束日期、结束时间用于数据统计中计算累计时长。: Start Date, Start Time, End Date, and End Time Are Used to Calculate Cumulative Duration in Data Statistics.
如果快速选择名称中颜色与此颜色不同，优先使用快速选择名称内配置的颜色。: If the Color in Quick Select Names Differs, the Color Configured in Quick Select Names Will Be Used Preferentially.
日历中长按日期方格可以直接跳转到该页面: Long Press on a Calendar Square to Directly Navigate to This Page
计划名称字数不能超过64个字符: Plan Name Must Be Less Than 64 Characters
计划次数必填且必须大于0: Plan Times Required and Must Be Greater Than 0
表示本月准备完成“xx”计划多少次，打卡时应该使用该计划名称，这样每一次打卡之后: Indicates How Many Times the 'xx' Plan is Prepared to Be Completed This Month. Use This Plan Name When Checking In, So That Each Check-In Updates the Progress of the Plan.
请输入计划的次数: Please Enter the Number of Plan Times
颜色值使用十六进制表示法，例如“#ffffff”表示纯白色，其中“#”后面跟着六: Color values are represented in hexadecimal notation, e.g., '#ffffff' represents pure white. The '#' is followed by six hexadecimal digits representing the red, green, and blue channels. Please enter a similar value.
事件标题字数不能超过12个字符: Event Title Must Be Less Than 12 Characters
备注字数不能超过200个字符: Remarks Must Be Less Than 200 Characters
请输入问题或建议: Please Enter Your Question or Suggestion
感谢您一直以来对我们的支持和信任！我们一直在努力为您提供更好的产品，而您的意见对: Thank you for your continuous support and trust! We are always striving to provide you with better products, and your feedback is crucial to us. We take every suggestion seriously and work hard to improve.
点击下方高亮的[累计数值]可以切换统计数据。: Click the highlighted [Cumulative Value] below to switch statistics.
数值是根据记录中的[数值]字段汇总而得出；时长通过记录中的“开始日期、开始时间，: The value is summarized from the [Value] field in the records; duration is calculated from 'Start Date, Start Time, End Date, End Time'.
首页展示开启后将在首页通过不同颜色的日期来展示: Home Page Display: Different colored dates will be shown on the home page after enabling.
结束日期必须大于等于开始日期: End Date Must Be Greater Than or Equal to Start Date
间隔周期指两次开始时间的间隔天数，比如第一次是1月1日开始，第二次是1月29日开: Interval period refers to the number of days between two start times, e.g., if the first starts on January 1st and the second on January 29th, the interval period is 28 days; 'First Start' and 'Second Start' are only for auxiliary calculation of the 'Interval Period', if you know the specific number of days, you can directly fill in 'Interval Period'.
由于你还没配置接受生日提醒的邮件地址，请先在个人信息中配置好邮箱地址后再进行该操: Since you have not configured an email address to receive birthday reminders, please configure your email address in personal information first.
节日简称不超过4个字符，该简称会展示在首页日历中，如果未配置简称，首页日历展示时: The festival abbreviation no more than 4 characters, which will be displayed on the home page calendar. If no abbreviation is configured, the home page calendar will truncate the long festival name.
该节日仅展示在个人的日历中，其他用户并不可见。: This festival is only displayed in the personal calendar and is not visible to other users.
当前计划共{{num}}组动作: Current Plan Contains {{num}} Sets of Actions
重复动作{{stepCount}}次，每次间隔{{stepTime}}秒，全部完: Repeat Action {{stepCount}} Times, Each Interval {{stepTime}} Seconds, Rest {{restTime}} Seconds After Completion
请添加至少一个执行子项: Please Add at Least One Execution Item
每次用时必填且不能为0: Time Per Session Required and Cannot Be 0
暂无子项，请点击底部按钮新增: No Sub-items, Please Click the Button at the Bottom to Add
开始时间和结束时间不能只出现一个: Both start and end times must be provided, not just one
当配置了数值、收入、支出、开始时间、结束时间后，下次快速选择时会自动填充这些值。: Once values for amount, income, expense, start time, and end time are configured, they will be automatically filled in next time for quick selection.
在表单中输入对方共享码绑定后，可以在自己的打卡视图中使用对方的数据，但对方并不能: After entering the other party's share code in the form and binding it, you can use the other party's data in your own check-in view, but the other party cannot use your data. You can exchange and bind each other's share codes to achieve mutual data sharing.
共 {{listLen}} 组任务 / 第 {{taskIndex}} 组: Total of {{listLen}} sets of tasks / Set {{taskIndex}}
您可以在此创建一个共享日历，该日历的数据会独立于首页的日历保存，在这个日历中你可: Create a shared calendar here, with data saved independently from the homepage calendar. Invite other users to maintain data together, commonly used for multi-employee room booking records, meeting room reservation records, and other collaborative data records, etc.
